termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon confirmation of this agreement unless otherwise specified. All payments are non-refundable except under conditions outlined in Section 3.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Client may cancel this agreement with written notice at least [X] days prior to the service date for a partial refund of [Y]%. Cancellations made less than [X] days prior will forfeit all payments. {siteName} reserves the right to cancel this agreement if unforeseen circumstances prevent service delivery, in which case a full refund will be issued.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: Client agrees to use the facility only for the purpose stated and in compliance with all applicable laws and {siteName} regulations. Client is responsible for any damages to the facility or equipment caused by Client or Client’s guests.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: {siteName} is not responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to personal property of Client or Client’s guests. Client agrees to indemnify and hold harmless {siteName} from any claims arising out of Client’s use of the facility.

faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and booking process.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: Navigate to the 'Dormitories' page, select your desired dates, browse available rooms, and click 'Book Now'. You'll then fill out a short form with your details and payment information.
faqQ2Title: What payment methods are accepted for dormitory bookings?
faqQ2Answer: For dormitory bookings, we primarily accept bank transfers. After submitting your booking request, you'll receive bank details and instructions to make the payment and submit proof via Telegram for verification.
faqQ3Title: How do companies book halls or sections?
faqQ3Answer: Companies need to register first. Once registered and approved, company representatives can log in, navigate to the 'Halls & Sections' page, select facilities, choose dates, specify services (like catering or LED projectors), and submit the booking request. An agreement will then be processed.
faqQ4Title: What are the catering options for hall bookings?
faqQ4Answer: We offer two levels of lunch and refreshment services. Level 1 is a standard offering, while Level 2 provides a more premium selection. You can choose your preferred level during the facility booking process.
faqQ5Title: Can I book multiple halls or sections at once?
faqQ5Answer: Yes, on the 'Halls & Sections' page, after selecting your dates, you can check the boxes next to multiple facilities you wish to book together. Then, click the 'Book Selected' button to proceed with a single booking request for all chosen items.
faqQ6Title: How is the agreement process handled for facility bookings?
faqQ6Answer: Once a facility booking is approved and payment (if applicable upfront) is confirmed, an agreement document will be prepared by our administration. It will be sent to the company representative. The company then needs to sign it and upload the signed copy through their company dashboard.
faqQ7Title: How can I check the status of my dormitory booking?
faqQ7Answer: Go to the 'My Dormitory' page from the main navigation. Enter the phone number you used during booking, and you'll see the status of your active, approved dormitory bookings.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below to view our digital brochure and learn more about our facilities and services.
scanForBrochureDesc: Use your phone camera or a QR scanner app.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure and well-maintained dormitory rooms suitable for students, trainees, and event attendees.
brochureHallsDesc: Spacious halls and flexible meeting sections equipped for conferences, workshops, and various events.
brochureCateringDesc: Delightful catering options, from refreshments to full lunch buffets, tailored to your event needs.
brochureAboutUsContent: Welcome to {siteName}, your premier partner for educational and event facility rentals in Oromia. We are dedicated to providing high-quality, accessible, and well-equipped spaces for training programs, conferences, workshops, and comfortable accommodation for participants. Our mission is to support the growth and development of our community by offering top-notch services and facilities.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: And many more amenities to ensure a productive and comfortable experience.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff and excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and a conducive learning/event environment.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Plan Your Visit!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We are eager to assist you with your booking needs or answer any questions you might have. Contact us today!
individualUserNote: Individual users can book dormitory rooms. Company registration is required for booking halls and sections.
errorLoadingSiteInfo: Error loading site information. Some features might be affected.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer part of the current booking process. Please use the main navigation to find what you need.
